Perjury
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors filed court papers late Wednesday opposing Barry Bonds’s demand that the jury’s verdict of guilty of obstruction of justice be tossed out or that he be granted a new trial.
snippet: Federal prosecutors filed court papers late Wednesday opposing Barry Bonds’s demand that the jury’s verdict of guilty of obstruction of justice be tossed out or that he be granted a new trial.
